front.title: Reilly EternaMark (REM) Protocol - Dual-Layer Digital Permanence Using DOI Archiving and Blockchain Timestamping

abstract.t: The Reilly EternaMark (REM) Protocol defines a dual-layer method for digital permanence through the integration of Digital Object Identifiers (DOIs) and blockchain timestamping. The protocol ensures digital artifacts are permanently identifiable, immutable, and verifiable for both present and future use.
